activities.name: GetFileList
activities.description: Get file list from processing container

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select DISTINCT DS_FILENAME FROM dwh.STG_ENTITY_VALID;
SELECT 1;

SELECT DISTINCT 1 AS  CNT FROM (
 select   DS_FILENAME from [dwh].[STG_COMPANY_ERROR_LOG]
 UNION 
 SELECT   DS_FILENAME from [dwh].[STG_WAREHOUSE_ERROR_LOG]
 UNION 
 SELECT   DS_FILENAME from [dwh].[STG_CONTACT_ERROR_LOG]
 ) A
